title: War of the Roses: His Ex Is Still In The Picture
description: Leigh has been dating Brad but his ex-girlfriend is still in the picture because she has been in Brad's son's life since he was a baby so they still have a relationship.  Leigh wants to believe she's just around for his son but is wondering if there's still something going on.
